name: Picross Mermaid — Nonograms
description:
Picross Mermaid — Nonograms is an exciting saga for fans of various puzzles and fairy tales.

The ocean hides many secrets, riddles and myths. This time, you'll travel from the distant middle ages to an underwater world alongside the Mermaid and the Woodcutter, and solve the mystery of the disappearing siren voices!

A multitude of quests and varied underwater kingdoms with their secrets await you. Griddlers take on bright colors and a new life as you solve them. A new fairytale world awaits you with a multitude of colorful sea creatures and their stories! Then one day, the endearing squarespace in the moon began unbroken. So you must hide mon in the shade room.

Top-notch, premium graphics and 200 diverse levels of varying difficulty. Your eyes will enjoy cross the logic puzzles. Get the colour concentration in the pix! Take a stroll down memory lane with 10x10 through 30x30 nonograms with a delightful musical score. It will guide you into the colour world of interesting fingers crossed puzzles.

If you like games like hsb - this game is for you! Be a pintar and chaperone the Mermaid in your coloring life. It is easy to learn and play with the luna color effect Explore worlds and you'll find out: what happened to the Mermaid? Who stole the sirens' voices and why? Why is the Woodcutter searching for a lyre in the sandbox?

- Japanese crosswords that come alive with light once they’re solved!
- 5 different worlds and 200 unforgettable levels!
- great practice for your logical and abstract thought processes!
- cute ocean dwellers: dolphins, crabs, fish, starfish, octopi and many more!
- simple interface and exciting gameplay!
- a story of magic, mages and mystical spells!
- mini-games and dialogues that’ll keep you wanting more!
- over 15 achievement, rewards and trophies for extra quests!
- stunning illustrations and wonderful music!
- more than 30 hours of exciting gameplay!
- the best way to have fun and expand your brain!
